text:
RELIGION

Baladhandayuthapani Swami Thirukkoil: Abishegam, Sukrawarpet, 10 a.m.

Vikasatarangini Trust: Discourse on Bhagavad Gita by Sri Sri Sri Tridandi Chinna Srimannarayanan Ramanjua Jeeyar Swami, Nani Auditorium, 6.30 p.m.

CULTURE

Sri Thyaga Brahma Gananjali: Music Festival, Sri Venugopalaswamy Temple, 6 p.m.

GENERAL

Coimbatore Vizha: Launch of 8{+t}{+h}edition of Vizha, Brooke Fields Mall, 4.30 p.m.

Western Ghats International School: Medical Expo, PG Pudur Ettimadai, 9.30 a.m.

The Institute of Indian Foundrymen: 12{+t}{+h}IFEX inauguration, 10 a.m.; 64th Indian Foundry Congress inauguration, CODISSIA Trade Fair Complex 4.30 p.m.,

Sri Ramakrishna Hospital: Mega blood donation camp, 9 a.m.

Jansons School of Business: Industry Connect JSB HR Summit 2016, Sivaganga Auditorium, Karumathampatti premises,

9.30 a.m.

Kalaingar Karunanidhi Institute of Technology: One-day national workshop, conference hall, 9 a.m.

The Coimbatore Productivity Council: Training programme on “Energy Conservation & Harmonics Mitigation’, 9.30 a.m.

The Indian Chamber of Commerce and Industry: Programme on “Six Sigma Entrepreneur Skills”, Chamber Towers, Coimbatore, 10 a.m.

Dr. Mahalingam College of Engineering and Technology: Workshop on “Open Source Technologies”, Campus premises, 9 a.m.

Karunya University: International Conference on Canadian Studies, Elohim Auditorium, 10 a.m.

Shri Nehru Maha Vidyala: Workshop on “Visual Basic & Internet and Web Designing”, Computer lab,

8:30 a.m.

Gem Hospital & Research Centre: Women’s Health Expo, Pankaja Mill Road, 11 a.m.

Sankara College of Science & Commerce: Lecture on “Manampol Vazhkkai and Marundhilla Vaithiyam”, Dhanam hall, 1:15 p.m.

CIMAT: Workshop on “J2EE” for MCA students, Accent Techno Soft, 9:30 a.m.

Hindusthan Polytechnic College: State-Level Technical Symposium on Science and Technology, 9:30 a.m.

CODISSIA: Entrepreneur development programme, Huzur road, 3 p.m.

Dr. SNS Rajalakshmi College of Arts and Science: Lecture on “Ethical Hacking”, 10 a.m.

Sri Jayendra Saraswathy Maha Vidyalaya College of Arts & Science: Lecture on “Big Data Analysis”,

11 a.m.

Hindusthan College of Arts and Science: Seminar on “Insight to Futuristic Bioscience”, 9:40 a.m.

Sri Kalaivani College of Education: Citizenship Training Camp, Vedic Mathematics and Teacher’s role in the society, 9:30 a.m.

SNR Sons College: Workshop on “ET Market & E-FILING”.

SNS Academy: Annual Sports Meet, Dr. SNS Rajalakshmi College of Arts and Science, 9:15 a.m.

Sree Narayana Guru College: Inter-College Cultural Festival, 9:30 a.m.

Dr. N.G.P. Arts & Science College: Extension activity on “Online Scholarship Examinations” for the students of Panchayat Union Middle School, 1:30 p.m.

Adwaith GNS Matriculation Higher Secondary School: Annual Day celebrations, 6 p.m.

GRG School of Management Studies: Annual inter-school event Urjith 2016, inauguration 10 a.m., valediction, 5 p.m.

Nanneri Kazhagam: Prof. Punithaa Ekambaram speaks on Viduthalaikku Vithitta Thyagigal, Sri Ramakrishna College of Arts and Science for Women, Avarampalayam Road, 10.30 a.m.

POLLACHI

Kongu Naatu Kaalnadai Thiruvizha: Cattle show, Zamin Samathur, near Pollachi, 9 a.m.
title: Coimbatore today
